EmailInputEdit:
1. Open Unite and go to: More > Store





2. With the Unite Store already open go to the bottom left corner and click "App updates" and then "Check for updates".





3. The software will check for updates and if there is an update pending you will be able to see that listed according to the modules you need to update.





If you need further assistance, please call us back and let us know.
Issue: Update the software to the latest version with the cloud storage
Solution: Go to More - Store - App Update - and then start the updates.
Step 2: Click on App Updates and click on install all updates.
Step 3: Start all the process for the update
